QuestData.Title: Off With Their Black Wings
QuestData.Description: Traitors. We Hyldnir have little love for them.$B$BThe dwellers of Valkyrion have gone unpunished for far too long. While we remained loyal to Thorim, they became the Lich King's lapdogs!$B$BThey call the ones who receive his gift val'kyr. They fly on feathered wings, like the harpies they are.$B$BYou will find Valkyrion far to the northwest, beyond the Temple of Storms. Slay these winged she-wolves, sister. Slay them and I will reward you with one of my most prized possessions.
QuestData.LogDescription: Iva the Vengeful in Brunnhildar Village wants you to go to Valkyrion and slay 12 Nascent Val'kyr.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you punish our wayward brethren?
QuestData.RewardText: The val'kyr are nothing but the Lich King's lapdogs. They will be put down like the scum they are. They've made their choice, now they have to live with the consequences.
